+ +export default function AdminDashboard() { + const router = useRouter(); + const [bookings, setBookings] = useState(initialBookings); + const [showAdd, setShowAdd] = useState(false); + const [showDetail, setShowDetail] = useState(false); + const [detailBooking, setDetailBooking] = useState(null); + const [newBooking, setNewBooking] = useState({ name: "", service: "", date: "", amount: "", status: "pending", phone: "", email: "", location: "" }); + + useEffect(() => { + if (typeof window !== "undefined") { + const saved = window.localStorage.getItem("adminAuth"); + if (saved !== "Detailing1313!") { + router.replace("/admin"); + } + } + }, [router]); + + // Calculate total revenue + const totalRevenue = bookings.reduce((sum, b) => sum + (b.amount || 0), 0); + + // Add new booking + const handleAddBooking = (e) => { + e.preventDefault(); + setBookings([ + ...bookings, + { ...newBooking, id: bookings.length + 1, amount: Number(newBooking.amount) } + ]); + setNewBooking({ name: "", service: "", date: "", amount: "", status: "pending", phone: "", email: "", location: "" }); + setShowAdd(false); + }; + + // Show booking details modal + const handleShowDetail = (booking) => { + setDetailBooking(booking); + setShowDetail(true); + }; + + return ( +
